================================
Disable Employee Welcome Message
================================
In Odoo, when you create an employee from an applicant, Odoo sends an email to the whole company.
This functionality is hardcoded and can not be disabled from the web interface.
This module prevents Odoo from sending the message.

Configuration
=============

Nothing to do. Only install the module.

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/116/8.0

help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback.
